name: Bellsprout
flavorText: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.
Attack2Text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

name: Weepinbell
flavorText: The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes. It spits a fluid that dissolves everything.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Victreebel
flavorText: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Grass Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you do, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Heracross-EX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: You may do 40 more damage. If you do, this Pokemon does 20 damage to itself. | When a Pokemon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

name: M Heracross-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 180 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.

name: Shroomish
flavorText: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.

name: Leafeon
flavorText: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage and heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Shelmet
flavorText: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Accelgor
flavorText: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon evolved from Shelmet during this turn, this attack does 40 more damage.
Attack2Text: If any damage is done to this Pokemon by attacks during your opponent's next turn, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.

name: Magmar
flavorText: Found near the mouth of a volcano. This fire-breather's body temperature is nearly 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Magmortar
flavorText: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to this Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If Electivire is on your Bench, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Torchic
flavorText: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Combusken
flavorText: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Blaziken
flavorText: It can clear a 30-story building in a leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 150 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Poliwag
flavorText: Its slick black skin is thin and damp. A part of its internal organs can be seen through the skin as a spiral pattern.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused. That Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Poliwhirl
flavorText: It can live in or out of water. When out of water, it constantly sweats to keep its body slimy.
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Poliwrath
flavorText: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 30 damage to itself.

name: Politoed
flavorText: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.
Ability1Text: Ignore all Colorless Energy in the attack cost of each of your Poliwag, Poliwhirl, and Poliwrath's attacks.

name: Glaceon
flavorText: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Seismitoad-EX
Attack1Text: Your opponent can't play any Item cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage to 2 of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Cubchoo
flavorText: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Beartic
flavorText: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokemon's Retreat Cost.
Attack2Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Clauncher
flavorText: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Clawitzer
flavorText: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.
Attack1Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Amaura
flavorText: This ancient Pokemon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.

name: Aurorus
flavorText: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.
Ability1Text: Any damage done by an opponent's attack to each of your Water Pokemon that has any Water Energy attached to it is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Raichu
flavorText: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Electabuzz
flavorText: Electricity runs across the surface of its body. In darkness, its body glows a whitish blue.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Electivire
flavorText: As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your Magmortar.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Plusle
flavorText: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
Attack1Text: Discard a basic Energy card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Minun
flavorText: Exposure to electricity from Minun and Plusle promotes blood circulation and relaxes muscles.
Attack1Text: Put 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Thundurus
flavorText: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon has a Pokemon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Lightning Slam during your next turn.

name: Dedenne
flavorText: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Drowzee
flavorText: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating only bad dreams.
Attack1Text: Whenever your opponent flips a coin during his or her next turn, treat it as tails.

name: Hypno
flavorText: It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took away a child it hypnotized.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. You may choose a Supporter card you find there. If you do, your opponent plays that Supporter card. However, you make all decisions for that card. (That Supporter card is discarded.)
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Jynx
flavorText: It wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is on your Bench, you may heal 10 damage from your Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Skorupi
flavorText: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Gothita
flavorText: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Gothorita
flavorText: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
Attack1Text: Look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck and put them back on top of his or her deck in any order.

name: Gothitelle
flavorText: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard any Stadium card in play. If you do, put a Stadium card with a different name from your discard pile into play.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.

name: Golett
flavorText: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Golurk
flavorText: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokemon by the ancient people who made them.
Attack1Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 60 more damage. Discard that Stadium card.

name: Machop
flavorText: It hefts a Graveler repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.

name: Machoke
flavorText: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: Machamp
flavorText: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.
Ability1Text: Each of your Fighting Pokemon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Hitmonlee
flavorText: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Hitmonchan
flavorText: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Hitmontop
flavorText: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by 10.
Attack1Text: Draw a card.
Attack2Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Breloom
flavorText: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
Attack1Text: Heal from this Pokemon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Makuhita
flavorText: It toughens up by slamming into thick trees over and over. It gains a sturdy body and dauntless spirit.

name: Hariyama
flavorText: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.
Ability1Text: Any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks from your opponent's Fire or Water Pokemon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Trapinch
flavorText: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.
Attack1Text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

name: Lucario-EX
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.
Attack2Text: You may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

name: M Lucario-EX
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: M Lucario-EX
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Mienfoo
flavorText: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Mienshao
flavorText: It wields the fur on its arm like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.
Attack1Text: Return this Pokemon and all cards attached to it to your hand.

name: Landorus
flavorText: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as "The Guardian of the Fields."
Attack1Text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Pancham
flavorText: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.
Attack1Text: If you have any Darkness Pokemon on your Bench, search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokemon and put it onto this Pokemon. (This counts as evolving this Pokemon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Pancham
flavorText: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Tyrunt
flavorText: This Pokemon was restored from a fossil. If something happens that it doesn't like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Tyrantrum
flavorText: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon has any Special Energy attached to it, this attack does 90 more damage.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't attack during your next turn.

name: Hawlucha
flavorText: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.
Ability1Text: Damage from this Pokemon's attacks isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon isn't a Pokemon-EX, this attack does nothing.

name: Hawlucha-EX
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon.
Attack1Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Drapion
flavorText: It takes great pride in its strength. Even though it can tear foes apart, it finishes them off with powerful poison.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon is Poisoned, this attack does 40 more damage.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Scraggy
flavorText: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling it skin up to its neck.

name: Scrafty
flavorText: It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected it is.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads. This Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Pangoro
flavorText: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won't put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.
Attack1Text: You may discard an Item card from your hand. If you do, this attack does 40 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

name: Clefairy
flavorText: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Clefairy
flavorText: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Clefable
flavorText: Its hearing is so acute it can hear a pin drop over half a mile away. It lives on quiet mountains.
Attack1Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Sylveon
flavorText: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.
Attack1Text: Move an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon to 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon's Echoed Voice attack does 50 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Klefki
flavorText: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.
Ability1Text: Each of your Fairy Pokemon's Resistance is now -40.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Dragonite-EX
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench, you may move any number of basic Energy attached to your Pokemon to this Pokemon. If you do, switch this Pokemon with your Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Vibrava
flavorText: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Flygon
flavorText: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.
Attack1Text: Attach as many basic Energy cards as you like from your hand to your Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokemon that has any Energy attached to it.

name: Noivern
flavorText: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.
Ability1Text: If any damage is done to this Pokemon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Lickitung
flavorText: Its long tongue, slathered with a gooey saliva, sticks to anything, so it is very useful.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Lickilicky
flavorText: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
Attack1Text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Eevee
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
flavorText: A rare Pokemon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.
Ability1Text: When you attach a basic Energy card from your hand to this Pokemon, you may search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokemon that is the same type as that Energy card and put it onto this Pokemon. (This counts as evolving this Pokemon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Slakoth
flavorText: The way Slakoth lolls around makes anyone who watches it feel like doing the same.
Attack1Text: Both Active Pokemon are now Asleep.

name: Vigoroth
flavorText: Its heartbeat is fast and its blood so agitated that it can't sit still for one second.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Slaking
flavorText: The world's laziest Pokemon. It moves to another spot when there's no food left within its reach.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Patrat
flavorText: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.
Attack1Text: Look at 1 of your face-down Prize cards.

name: Watchog
flavorText: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose an Item card you find there. Your opponent shuffles that card into his or her deck.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Tornadus
flavorText: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.
Attack1Text: You may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Noibat
flavorText: They live in pitch black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.

name: Heracross-EX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: You may do 40 more damage. If you do, this Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Seismitoad-EX
Attack1Text: Your opponent can't play any Item cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage to 2 of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Lucario-EX
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.
Attack2Text: You may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

name: Dragonite-EX
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench, you may move any number of basic Energy attached to your Pokemon to this Pokemon. If you do, switch this Pokemon with your Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: M Heracross-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 180 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.

name: M Lucario-EX
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.
